snippet: “Million Dollar Arm” centers on a self-centered sports agent who recruits potential major league pitchers in India.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews Craig Gillespie film Million Dollar Arm, starring Jon Hamm.
lead_paragraph: “Million Dollar Arm” centers on a self-centered sports agent who recruits potential major league pitchers in India.
